mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ck.id) FROM ole_ef_check ck LEFT JOIN ole_sys_dict dic ON ck.status = dic.enum_value AND dic.type_value = '1501' LEFT JOIN (SELECT ECP.check_id,ECP.person_id as personId,ECP.dept_id deptId,GROUP_CONCAT( BDP.name) PERSONNAME FROM ole_ef_check_person ECP , OLE_BASE_DEPT_PERSON BDP WHERE FIND_IN_SET(BDP.ID,ECP.person_id) GROUP BY CHECK_ID, ECP.dept_id ) CHECK_PERSON ON CK.id = CHECK_PERSON.CHECK_ID LEFT JOIN ole_base_dept bd ON bd.id = CHECK_PERSON.deptId

SELECT ck.id AS id, ck.check_title AS checkTitle, ck.check_object AS checkObject, dic.enum_desc AS STATUS, ck.start_date AS startDate, ck.end_date AS endDate, ck.check_num AS checkNum, ck.check_basis AS checkBasis, ck.check_content AS checkContent, ck.check_way AS checkWay, ck.create_by AS createBy, ck.create_name AS createName, CHECK_PERSON.deptId AS deptId, bd.name AS deptName, ck.check_num AS checkNum, CHECK_PERSON.PERSONNAME AS personName FROM ole_ef_check ck LEFT JOIN ole_sys_dict dic ON ck.status = dic.enum_value AND dic.type_value = '1501' LEFT JOIN (SELECT ECP.check_id,ECP.dept_id deptId,ECP.person_id as personId,GROUP_CONCAT( BDP.name) PERSONNAME FROM ole_ef_check_person ECP , OLE_BASE_DEPT_PERSON BDP WHERE FIND_IN_SET(BDP.ID,ECP.person_id) GROUP BY CHECK_ID, ECP.dept_id ) CHECK_PERSON ON CK.id = CHECK_PERSON.CHECK_ID LEFT JOIN ole_base_dept bd ON bd.id = CHECK_PERSON.deptId
order by ck.create_date desc limit #{start}, #{length}

SELECT check_num as caseNum, check_title as caseName, start_date as caseTime, dic.enum_desc as caseStatus, re.road_name as caseAddress, dp.name as caseFzfryname, dp1.name as caseZzfryname FROM ole_ef_check ec LEFT JOIN ole_ef_check_person pn ON pn.check_id=ec.id LEFT JOIN ole_sys_dict dic ON ec.status=dic.enum_value AND dic.type_value='1501' LEFT JOIN ole_ef_check_record re ON re.check_id=ec.id LEFT JOIN ole_base_dept_person dp ON dp.id=re.assist_person_id LEFT JOIN ole_base_dept_person dp1 ON dp1.id=pn.person_id
pn.dept_id = #{params.deptId} and (pn.person_id = #{params.personId} or re.assist_person_id= #{params.personId})
AND ec.status = #{params.status}
AND ec.check_title like concat('%', #{params.checkTitle}, '%')
AND date(ec.create_date) = curdate()
AND date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= date(ec.create_date)
AND date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) <= date(ec.create_date)
AND date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL 180 DAY) <= date(ec.create_date)
AND date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL 365 DAY) <= date(ec.create_date)
ORDER BY ec.create_date DESC
LIMIT #{params.startNo},#{params.endNo}
;
SELECT * FROM ole_base_dept_person per LEFT JOIN ole_ef_check_person pn ON pn.person_id=per.ID LEFT JOIN ole_ef_check ck ON pn.check_id=ck.id WHERE ck.id=#{params.id};

SELECT ser.id AS id, ser.nickname AS name, ser.person_id AS personId, ser.dept_id AS deptId FROM ole_sys_user ser WHERE ser.person_id IN( SELECT pn.person_id FROM ole_ef_check ck LEFT JOIN ole_ef_check_person pn ON pn.check_id = ck.id WHERE ck.check_num=#{id} )

SELECT ck.id AS id, ck.check_title AS checkTitle, ck.check_object AS checkObject, ck.start_date AS startDate, ck.end_date AS endDate, dic.enum_desc AS STATUS, ck.check_basis AS checkBasis, ck.check_content AS checkContent, ck.check_way AS checkWay, ck.create_name AS createName, pn.dept_id AS deptId, pn.person_id AS personId, per.name AS personName, dt.name AS deptName, ck.check_num AS checkNum FROM ole_ef_check ck LEFT JOIN ole_ef_check_person pn ON pn.check_id=ck.id LEFT JOIN ole_base_dept_person per ON per.ID= pn.person_id LEFT JOIN ole_base_dept dt ON dt.id= pn.dept_id LEFT JOIN ole_sys_dict dic ON ck.status=dic.enum_value AND dic.type_value='1501' WHERE ck.id=#{params.id}

SELECT ck.id AS id,ck.check_title AS checkTitle,ck.check_object AS checkObject,ck.start_date AS startDate,ck.end_date AS endDate, dic.enum_desc AS 'status',ck.check_basis AS checkBasis,ck.check_content AS checkContent,ck.check_way AS checkWay, ck.create_by AS createBy,ck.create_name AS createName,pn.dept_id AS deptId,pn.person_id AS personId,per.name AS personName,dt.name AS deptName,ck.check_num AS checkNum, rd.id AS recordId,rd.assist_person_id AS assistPersonId,xbr.name assistPersonName,rd.check_mode AS checkMode,rd.check_mode_id AS checkModeId, rd.check_object_type AS checkObjectType,rd.checked_user_name AS checkedUserName, rd.checked_user_id AS checkedUserId, rd.checked_date AS checkedDate, rd.road_name AS roadName, rd.check_situation AS checkSituation, rd.unit_name AS unitName, rd.regist_num AS registNum,rd.legal_person AS legalPerson FROM ole_ef_check ck LEFT JOIN ole_ef_check_person pn ON pn.check_id=ck.id LEFT JOIN ole_base_dept_person per ON per.ID= pn.person_id LEFT JOIN ole_base_dept dt ON dt.id= pn.dept_id LEFT JOIN ole_sys_dict dic ON ck.status=dic.enum_value AND dic.type_value='1501' left join ole_ef_check_record rd on ck.id=rd.check_id LEFT JOIN ole_base_dept_person xbr ON rd.assist_person_id= xbr.id WHERE ck.id=#{checkId}

SELECT ec.id as id, check_title as checkTitle, sd.enum_desc as caseStatus, ec.status as status FROM ole_ef_check ec LEFT JOIN ole_sys_dict sd ON sd.enum_value = ec.status AND sd.type_value = '1501' WHERE check_num=#{checkNum}

SELECT ck.id AS checkId, ck.check_title AS checkTitle, edc.id AS docContentId, edt.name AS templateName,edt.id AS templateId ,osd.`enum_desc` AS checkStatus FROM ole_ef_doc_content edc LEFT JOIN ole_ef_check ck ON edc.case_id = ck.id LEFT JOIN ole_ef_doc_template edt ON edt.id = edc.template_id LEFT JOIN ole_sys_dict osd ON osd.`enum_value` = edc.`flow_status` AND osd.`type_value` = '1501' WHERE ck.id=#{checkId} order by edc.create_date desc

SELECT bdp.id AS personId, bdp.name AS personName,obd.name AS deptName,obd.id AS deptId FROM ole_sys_user su LEFT JOIN ole_base_dept_person AS bdp ON bdp.ID = su.person_id LEFT JOIN ole_base_dept obd ON obd.id = bdp.dept_id WHERE su.dept_id = #{dept_id} AND su.status = 1 AND su.id IN ( SELECT userid FROM ole_sys_role_user sru WHERE sru.roleId = '26');
SELECT count(*) as count FROM ACT_RU_TASK WHERE ASSIGNEE_ = #{id} AND PROC_DEF_ID_ LIKE 'proCheck%'
